title: Desiring Intimacy with the Person Beyond the Mystical Door
description:
This "thief in the night" livestream follows in the previous conversation you can find here. https://youtu.be/xs6Nzvf4bMA

And follows on a previous posted video https://youtu.be/XSeZG3Dyv_k

Nick Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYSXopxC8Z9uLQXW8bJa-wsMYxNKb4CGX
